name: GISSmartSwitch
0:
”Alexa, Gis Smart Switch”
”Turn on the kitchen switch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. i. s. smart switch
des:
Easily control your home devices by using GIS Smart Switch.
GIS Smart Switch is a IoT device, connect to wifi using ESP8266 module, and can remotely control your home device, like light, electric fan, and electric heater, etc.
You don’t have to do any additional setting.
Before you get GIS Smart Switch, we will configure anything for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
